CustomFieldTranslation.name: AccountHardCreditNonSkew_Incremental__c
CustomFieldTranslation.help: When checked, the Account Hard Credit (Non-Skew) nightly job limits the number of Accounts selected for recalculation by looking for recently updated Opportunities on those Accounts. This helps to improve Customisable Rollup nightly job performance.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: Incremental Account Hard Credit Non-Skew
